title: Onboarding Get Started button does not navigate to app
description: After completing onboarding steps 1-3, clicking the 'Get Started' button on Step 3 does nothing. The button appears clickable but does not navigate to the dashboard or complete the onboarding flow. This completely blocks new users from accessing the app.
steps_to_reproduce: Create new account or login with fresh account
Complete Step 1: Company Setup (name, company, type, team size, country)
Complete Step 2: Skip payment or select plan
On Step 3: Select 'Explore the dashboard' option
Observe: Nothing happens, page remains on Step 3
expected: User should be redirected to the dashboard after clicking Get Started
actual: Button click has no effect, user is stuck on onboarding Step 3
suggested_fix: Check the onClick handler for the Get Started button. Verify it properly calls the navigation function and completes the onboarding state.

changes: Added setIsSaving(false) in success path of handleComplete
Added better error handling for non-critical operations (settings, checklist)
Added explicit check for onComplete callback with error message if missing
Enhanced handleOnboardingComplete in App.jsx to explicitly set organization in store
